NGon.name: N-Gon
NGon.code:
COMPOSITE o
LINE Line1, $styles.default, (526, 373), (909, 373)
POLY Polygon2, $styles.default, [ Line1@end ], 1
DO n
ROTATE Line1, 360 / n
EXTPOLY Polygon2, [ Line1@end ]
ENDDO

Star.name: Star

spokeRatio.description: Determines the length of the spokes

Star.code:
COMPOSITE o
LINE Line1, $styles.default, (362, 364), (832, 364)
APP o.objects, Line1
POLY Polygon2, $styles.default, [ Line1@end ], 1
APP o.objects, Polygon2
DO spokes
ROTATE Line1, 180  / spokes
EXTPOLY Polygon2, [ Line1@(spokeRatio)]
ROTATE Line1, 180 / spokes
EXTPOLY Polygon2, [ Line1@end ]
ENDDO
FILL Polygon2, "#fce654", 0.1
